name: Adult & Senior Programs
description: A safe, friendly and welcoming environment for adults and seniors to meet new friends, have fun and learn. Programs are offered for both Fall and Spring Semesters. Fall semester is from September to December and Spring semester is from January to May. Registration is required for each semester. Once registered, you can join all the classes/activities they offer in the semester. Activities include: - Digital Education - Dance - Music - Tai Chi - Painting - Ceramics - ESL Classes

keywords: congregate meals for seniors and people with disabilities
